Description: Fragment of a papyrus document with 4 lines of Coptic text written along the fibres (recto); other fragments attached with faint writing discernible on recto and verso, perhaps intended for book-binding. Photographed with EA 75329, 75327, 75326.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118082) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118082)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
